channel.title: Profit-losses on WETHOD / Learning Center

item.title: Profit & Loss
item.description: Overview This section shows the Revenues of your company, yearly and by month, considering all the costs. The result is the Profit & Loss that helps you understand how much you are actually earning and how your business is going. We have: Gross Margin: Revenues - External Costs Net Margin: Gross Margin - Payroll Profit & Loss: Net Margin - G&A - Marketing You cannot add or modify data here, you have to do it in the specific section of the voice that you are changing.
